channel.title: Skillcape requirements
channel.description:
ok well i was trying to change the req for skilcapes and now when i wear a str cape it says i need 100 attk and dosent let me wear.
can ne1 post how to do it right or show their code

item.title: Skillcape requirements
item.dc:creator: @slim_2021 slim_2021
item.description:
@slim_2021 wrote:

Well this is what my attack cape looks like for requirements, and it works fine

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == 14075) { return 100; } if (ItemID == 14073) { return 100; }

Thats under

/*Equipment level checking*/

wouldnt hurt to try i guess

Read full topic
